name: muscle-band
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s physical moves by 10%.
short_effect: Held: Boosts the damage of physical moves used by the holder by 10%.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This headband exudes strength, slightly boosting the power of physical moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This headband exudes strength, slightly boosting the power of physical moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This headband exudes strength, slightly boosting the power of physical moves.
